Sentencas: Functionally graded solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathodes have been prepared from mixtures of strontium-doped lanthanum manganite (LSM) and gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) using slurry spraying techniques.
Titulo: Functionally graded composite cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Similar samples were also prepared from mixtures of LSM and ytriia-stabilised zirconia (YSZ).
Titulo: Functionally graded composite cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A current collector comprising a mixture of LSM and strontium-doped lanthanum cobaltite (LSCO) was then applied to both cathode types.
Titulo: Functionally graded composite cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Samples were characterised using scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Functionally graded composite cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Characterisation using EIS techniques showed that cathodes incorporating CGO into the structure gave improved performance over those fabricated using YSZ.
Titulo: Functionally graded composite cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These performance gains were most noticeable as the temperature was decreased towards 700 degreesC, and were maintained during the testing of three cell membrane electrode assemblies fabricated to the Rolls-Royce design.
Titulo: Functionally graded composite cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells
